poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: So sumbdy or sumhn's put a mortal hex on me: I'm going to die and rot. No, a mortal sex. We play this game wi the grunts: what's under the figleaf? Another onky! - A whit? - One o thae buttonholes To go wi the two wee buttons on yr chist. No, it's this! They looked. They were fucking helpless. Then here's this wanker wi a flaming sword Saying Get thee hence! - I says what? Get thee sense? But what can y dae? Whack him wi yr rubber truncheon?
